moves.1... e5: Normal opening for black and everyone is happy
moves.2... f6: I prefer the queenside pawn defense
moves.3... c6: I guess he's hoping for a d5 move next.
moves.5. Nxe5: I know this is a risky move that could easily go wrong but i was curious
moves.5... fxe5: Expected and now im thinking if that was a good idea. Surely he won't fall for it. Or will he?
moves.6. Qh5+: hahaha i checked you. It now depends on his move.
moves.7. Qxe5#: HAHAHAHAHAHAHA what a checkmate within 7 moves. g6 would have made him live slightly longer

gameName: An amazing start...or end? you decide
